title: The Elephant Man
writer: Christopher De Vore (screenplay), Eric Bergren (screenplay), David Lynch (screenplay), Frederick Treves (book), Ashley Montagu (in part on the book "The Elephant Man: A Study in Human Dignity")
actors: Anthony Hopkins, John Hurt, Anne Bancroft, John Gielgud
plot: John Merrick (whose real name was Joseph, as this is based on a true story) is an intelligent and friendly man, but he is hated by his Victorian-era English society because he is severely deformed. Once he is discovered by a doctor, however, he is saved from his life in a freak show and he is treated like the human being that he really is.
awards: Nominated for 8 Oscars. Another 10 wins & 13 nominations.
name: The Elephant Man
